text: void scanNumb ( int * a ) { int c = 0 ; * a = 0 ; while ( c < '0' ) c = getchar ( ) ; while ( c >= '0' && c <= '9' ) { * a = * a * 10 + c - '0' ; c = getchar ( ) ; } } int main ( int argc , char * argv [ ] ) { int t , n , i , j ; scanNumb ( & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanNumb ( & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanNumb ( & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = n - 2 ; i <= 0 ; i -- ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] > a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ? a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] : a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }
